title: Downloading and up comes a "unexpected error"
body: Basically I have a good friend, who i want to get into league, she seems really interested, BUUUT, whenever she tries to download it, it keeps crashing, over and over again. any ideas? Apparently she has a Gateway Laptop with windows 10 but thats about all I can tell you.

replies.body: Those unexpected errors can be a little hard to diagnose sometimes since they typically pop up when something goes wrong and the client just doesn't know what happened. Since this is the first time she's trying to download the game, let's first make sure she's got all the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) set up. Double check the steps in that guide and let me know if its able to help!
